cleaned_text: Teresa A Davis, Ph.D. Picture Teresa A Davis, Ph.D. Professor Phone Phone [tdavis@bcm.edu](mailto:tdavis@bcm.edu) Positions - Professor - Pediatrics-Nutrition Baylor College of Medicine Houston, TX US - Adjunct Professor - Department of Nutrition and Food Science; Department of Animal Science Texas A&M United States Education - Advanced Training from Washington University - 01/1980 - St. Louis, MO United States - Ph.D. from University Of Tennessee - 01/1980 - Knoxville, TN United States - M.S. from University Of Tennessee - 01/1976 - Knoxville, TN United States - B.S. from University Of Tennessee - 01/1975 - Knoxville, TN United States Honors & Awards - Editor-in-Chief - The Journal of Nutrition (01/2014 - 12/2023) - President - American Society for Nutrition (06/2012 - 05/2013) - Director-at-Large - American Society of Animal Science (07/2014 - 07/2017) - Scientific Advisor - International Life Sciences Institute North America Food, Nutrition & Safety Program (01/2016 - 01/2019) - Research Mentor Award - Department of Pediatrics, Baylor College of Medicine (06/2010) - Animal Growth and Development Award - American Society of Animal Science (07/2007) - Fulbright United States Distinguished American Scholar - Fulbright New Zealand-United States Educational Foundation (01/2001) - E.L.R.
